Topic.Title: PULL BACK THE CURTAIN: THERE'S NO MIGHTY WIZARD OF OZ BEHIND THERE

Message.Msg: I assume you are talking about FB.. I don't think Zuck or the retail investors who invested in that stk even realized how many shrs 2.14B really are... And at $38. you are talking somewhere in the neighborhood of $80B.. Now they are getting a math lesson!! Or better yet, a lesson on how the investment bankers on Wall St, will sell you a pig in the poke.. Here is the amuzing part.. Lets say they raised $70B on the IPO.. If you check out key statistics board of FB.. It shows they have $3.7B cash and $369M debt??? What happened to all those other billions??? I have a feeling a lot of investment banks, are probably retiring after that one IPO!! You would think most the money, invested in that stk would have been going into FB coffers, to run the Co.. What a joke!! Whether you bought the stk at $30. or $38. Of that money.. You now have about $1.50 of it, for all practical purposes!!! They say there is one born every minute!!

Topic.Title: PULL BACK THE CURTAIN: THERE'S NO MIGHTY WIZARD OF OZ BEHIND THERE

Message.Msg: Here is the laughable part!! They attributed that 8 cent per shr loss, for this period, to expenses incurred from IPO???

Message.Title: Place your bets folks...
Message.Msg: They didn't start selling those weekly options, because those manipulators don't want you playing them... Now are you smart enough to figure out what they are going to do?? Hey they know how you are betting, because they are the ones, selling those options... If us dummies, buy enough calls in the money.. They will drive it lower.. Buy more puts than calls, in the money.. They will drive it higher... And in reading that options board.. It shows how many of each has traded.. What we don't know and they do.. If people are buying them or closing out their positions?? Where we may think people are buying.. It may be the very oposite, and the manipulators are actually the ones buying!!!

Message.Title: Market will move down!!!
Message.Msg: GDP number not bad enough for any QE3. I think we will retest the $190 level soon. Good luck to all.

hammie -- if IBM closes over $196 and you go poof and don't come back for a follow-up course correction post it will reflect poorly on your sincerity. And I know you would like more interaction with the regular, fact based posters who other people sometimes reply to. But of course you wouldn't want to hear from the trash posters here who make fun of you. Try posting about IBM instead of about yourself. Nobody thinks you have a clue where IBM, or the DOW, or the "market" is going from day-to-day. Get it?

Message.Title: Mainframe Software Maker CA Tanking >
Message.Msg: Stock marks death cross on a day when the dow is up 220 ? what does this imply for Big blue ? http://finance.yahoo.com/q/pr?s=CA+Profile CA Technologies, together with its subsidiaries, provides enterprise information technology (IT) management software and solutions in the United States and internationally. The company operates in three segments: Mainframe Solutions, Enterprise Solutions, and Services. The Mainframe Solutions segment offers CA Mainframe Chorus for DB2 database management, security and compliance management, and storage management; and Next-Generation Mainframe Management strategy, which offers management capabilities to mainframe staff. The Enterprise Solutions segment provides service assurance, security (identity and access management), service and portfolio management, and virtualization and service automation. The Services segment offers various customer support services, s
"what does this imply for Big blue ?" ABSOLUTELY NUTHIN'!! SAY IT AGAIN!! Did CA lower forecasts? Did IBM lower forecasts? You comparing apples to mangoes, dude.
